articles.headline: aXcelerate Skills Officially Launched as New Competency & Authorisation Management Platform
articles.summary: aXcelerate launched Skills, a new platform for enterprises in high-risk industries to manage workforce capability, roles, and authorisations at scale, connecting learning outcomes from SMS and LMS into a single source of truth with future AI-driven recommendations.

articles.headline: aXcelerate Academy Officially Launched on 3 November
articles.summary: aXcelerate Academy launched providing structured, self-paced courses for teams to build mastery across key product areas from admin essentials to complex workflows.

articles.headline: Multi-Short Answer Question Support for AI-Assisted Marking Coming in November
articles.summary: aXcelerate announced expansion of AI-assisted marking to multi-short answer questions in November, following reductions in marking time reported by clients like Macallan College.

articles.headline: Learner Onboarding Surpasses 100,000 Completed Submissions Since Launch
articles.summary: Learner Onboarding feature has transformed enrolment processes for hundreds of RTOs with over 100,000 completed submissions, enabling faster conversions and improved compliance; launched earlier in May 2025.

articles.headline: aXcelerate Announces Early Adopter Status for VET Data Streamlining Initiative
articles.summary: aXcelerate is an early adopter of the VET Data Streamlining initiative by DEWR and NCVER, developing automated validation dashboards and compliance tools rolling out late 2025 into 2026.
